metadata.title: MindFrame - Mental Utility for Peak Performance
metadata.description: AI brain tuning tool. Neuro-sessions with an idealized version of your voice and binaural beats.

hero.title: Mental Utility for Peak Performance
hero.subtitle: MindFrame is your personal neuro-tuning tool. AI generates sessions for your specific needs: morning activation, pre-work focus, evening recovery. Binaural beats synchronize brain hemispheres in 8-10 minutes.
hero.socialProofText: users already harnessing the power of their voice

problem.title: Why External Affirmations
problem.bad1: A stranger's voice triggers subconscious distrust.
problem.bad2: Generic phrases don't address your specific pain points.
problem.good1: Your brain can't critique its own voice.

demo.title: Feel the
demo.subtitle: Press play and feel the difference

morning.title: Morning Activation
morning.description: Your voice clone + binaural beats. Energy and clarity boost for the whole day.

evening.title: Evening Deactivation
evening.description: Deep relaxation and transition to recovery mode. Perfect sleep.

step1.title: Record Your Voice
step1.description: Read a short text (30 seconds). This creates your unique voice profile.

step2.title: Choose Your Goal
step2.description: What do you need right now? Fall asleep, calm down before a meeting, or enter flow state.

step3.title: Listen
step3.description: AI instantly generates a personalized session. Your voice + music + binaural beats.

voiceClone.title: Idealized Voice
voiceClone.description: Not just a clone — an enhanced version. More confident, deeper, calmer. Bypasses psychological barriers and triggers maximum trust.

ai.title: Personal Neuro-Protocols
ai.description: AI creates programs for specific tasks: morning activation, evening deactivation, pre-work focus, stress recovery.

binaural.title: Binaural Synchronization
binaural.description: Gamma 40Hz for activation, Alpha 10Hz for focus, Theta 6Hz for relaxation. Hemisphere sync in 8-10 minutes.

science.title: It's Not Magic, It's
science.description: The methodology is based on neuroplasticity and cognitive behavioral therapy principles. We use the "familiar voice effect" to bypass the psyche's defense mechanisms.
science.badge4Sub: Your voice belongs only to you
science.point1: Your brain can't critique its own voice — evolutionary trust mechanism
science.point2: Idealized voice activates trust zones 3x stronger
science.point3: Binaural beats synchronize hemispheres for the desired state

morning.title: Clarity & Drive
morning.description: Morning protocol. Get a dopamine boost and set yourself up for achieving goals in 5 minutes.

anxiety.title: Point of Calm
anxiety.description: Relieves anxiety before important meetings. Your voice restores a sense of control and safety.

focus.title: Deep Flow
focus.description: Maximum concentration mode. Work without distractions at peak performance.

sleep.title: Perfect Sleep
sleep.description: Shuts off mental noise. Quick transition to delta sleep and full overnight recovery.

cta.title: Ready to Change Your Life
cta.subtitle: No card. No registration. First 3 sessions free.

library.title: My Sessions
library.empty: Empty yet. Launch your first neuro-session!

settings.title: Settings
settings.voiceCloneDescription: Record 30-60 sec. AI will create an enhanced version — more confident and deeper.
settings.voiceProfileDescription: How should your enhanced voice sound?

limits.description: You've used all free sessions. Subscribe for full Mental Utility access.

voiceSetup.title: Create Your Voice
voiceSetup.subtitle: Record 30-60 seconds — AI will create an enhanced version
voiceSetup.sampleText: I choose clarity of thought and calm. Every day I become stronger and more confident. My decisions lead me to my goals.

profileSelect.title: Choose Voice Profile
profileSelect.subtitle: How should the enhanced version sound?
